law.catch_line: In performing its responsibilities in or on the premises of any State building, the Commission shall...
law.text:
In performing its responsibilities in or on the premises of any State building, the Commission shall seek the advice of:
the President of the Senate and the Speaker of the House of Delegates for any State building used by the Legislative Branch of the State government;
the Governor for any State building used by the Executive Branch of the State government; and
the Chief Judge of the Court of Appeals for any State building used by the Judicial Branch of the State government.
